execution_quality: Agent made no contribution during the design phase - zero tool calls, no analysis, no engagement with the technical specification.
work_category: Design specification with user proposing concrete optimizations (operator symbols, entity ID prefixes, abbreviated storage) and seeking confirmation to proceed with implementation.
summary: Agent remained silent throughout a complete design specification phase where user proposed operator symbols and entity ID prefixing. User independently concluded the design was solid and moved directly to implementation request, showing confidence but also that agent participation was unnecessary.
follow_up_pattern: User issued a clear implementation directive ('yes, implement it'), indicating they were satisfied with their own design and ready to move to the coding phase.
